data.title: Cincinnati Reds Fans' Home for Baseball Discussion
data.meta_description:
Maybe it is just me, but it seems as if today's Rock radio (not pop/top 40) formats are way too specialized with shrinking playlists.  Mainstream (AOR) Rock radio is becoming a thing of the past. 
 
Rock stations have either gone the "Classic Rock" (Read: "Hotel California" and the like repeated ad nauseam." or the "Active Rock" (Read: Predominately Bad--screaming/monotone-- Metal mixed with solid Mainstream bands such as the Foo Fighters."  Adult Album Alternative Stations (Rock, for the most
data.text:
